message: Let's make a deal. I take $70, you take $30. This seems fair to me considering the money loses value quickly for you.
I propose we split the money 60/40 in my favor. Since the money depreciates faster for me, it's only fair I get a slightly larger share. Let's work together to make sure we both get something!
Bob, your offer was a bit too greedy. I'm proposing 65/35. This accounts for the depreciation while still being a reasonable split. It's important we reach an agreement soon!
Alice, we need to reach a compromise.  I'm offering 55/45 in my favor, acknowledging the faster depreciation for me.  Let's find a solution before things get worse for both of us!
Bob, we're running out of time! My final offer is 60/40.  This is the most I can offer given the depreciation. Let's be sensible and seal the deal now!
